metadata.title: CVE-2020-28972 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In SaltStack Salt before 3002.5, authentication to VMware vcenter, vsphere,and esxi servers (in the vmware.py files) does not always validate theSSL/TLS certificate.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
